/usr/bin/g++ -g CMakeFiles/renderer.dir/src/Scene.cpp.o CMakeFiles/renderer.dir/src/main.cu.o -o renderer   -L/usr/local/cuda-12/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-12/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda-12/lib64 /usr/local/cuda-12/lib64/libcudart.so -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
